enum.name: LED_FILL_MODE
enum.description: How to fill LEDs (Fill all, Starting from a specfic LED, etc.)

entry.name: LED_FILL_MODE_ALL
entry.description: Fill All LEDs in Strip with Colour

entry.name: LED_FILL_MODE_INDEX
entry.description: Fill (LENGTH) LEDs with colours in (ARRAY). Start from LED (INDEX).

entry.name: LED_FILL_MODE_FOLLOW_FLIGHT_MODE
entry.description: All LEDs in all* strips change according to flight-mode.

entry.name: LED_FILL_MODE_CLEAR
entry.description: Fill All LEDs in Strip with Black.

message.name: LED_STRIP_CONFIG
message.description: Set an LED strips colours. Can set up to 8 starting from led_index, or all using fill_mode=LED_FILL_MODE_ALL.
message.field: Number of LEDs to fill (limited to 8 by colors array)

message.name: LED_STRIP_STATE
message.description: Current LED State. Emitted by LED 'server'.
message.field: How many LEDs on strip_id are being reported, starting from led_index
Index of first LED being reported
Boolean indicating if LED colours are following the flightmode (1) or not (0)
